item.title: [GROOVY-1829] Problem with GString as names of the method call inside a closure.
item.description:

exhibit the same problem:

"/$controller/$action" {
}
}

//class ClassWithClosure {

{ // }

// }
//}

println "${mappings.getClass().getName()}"
